summary: A glowing review of The Godfather, praising its cinematography, acting, score, and overall quality as one of the greatest movies ever made.
positive: Outstanding cinematography and lighting that add to the film's beauty
Haunting and memorable score by Nina Rota
Masterful direction by Francis Ford Coppola
Brilliantly written screenplay that is intelligent, thought-provoking, and darkly humorous
Fantastic acting with no weak performances
Complex and rich characters that are brought to life
Considered one of the 10 greatest movies ever made
